channel.title: CVE Feed for josevega -- Display custom fields in the frontend – Post and User Profile Fields
channel.description: The latest CVEs for josevega -- Display custom fields in the frontend – Post and User Profile Fields

item.title: CVE-2023-6983|2024-02-05T21:21:31.751Z -- josevega -- display%20custom%20fields%20in%20the%20frontend%20%E2%80%93%20post%20and%20user%20profile%20fields
item.description: The Display custom fields in the frontend – Post and User Profile Fields plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.1 via the vg_display_data shortcode due to missing validation on a user controlled key. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to retrieve potentially sensitive post meta.
